enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for sophomore, juniors, and seniors only.
title: DOHA HISTORY 387-0-70 History Adv Special Topics:

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course examines the growth of four of the world's great cities: St. Petersburg, Bombay, Shanghai, and Dubai in the 18th, 19th, 20th, and 21st centuries. The growth of these mega-cities provide a lens for understanding broader historical developments including Absolutism, the Industrial Revolution, Capitalism, Communism, Urbanization, Imperialism, Anti-Imperialism, Nationalism, the Cold War, and Globalization.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
• Prerequisites: None

  • Open to sophomores and above

  • Open for Cross-Registration

subject: HISTORY
